Here some website and podcasts that I use for music discovery.

-   [All Songs Considered](https://www.npr.org/sections/allsongs/) (especially New Music Friday).

-   [Album of the Year](https://www.albumoftheyear.org/)

-   [Bandcamp](https://bandcamp.com/) (particularly Bandcamp Weekly)

-   [Post Trash](http://post-trash.com/)

-   [Gorilla vs Bear](https://www.gorillavsbear.net/)

-   [r/indieheads](https://www.reddit.com/r/indieheads/)

-   [The Needle Drop](https://www.youtube.com/@theneedledrop)

-   [A Closer Listen](https://acloserlisten.com/)

-   [Pitchfork](https://pitchfork.com/)

-   [Loud and Quiet](https://www.loudandquiet.com/)

-   My texting group chat entitled "Safe Place for Pretentious Musical Discussion" (Hi Tim, Jo, and Sid)
